QuestData.Title: The Splintered Path
QuestData.Description: First... before the war-cries... we heard the trees.$B$BGroaning, creaking, and finally crashing down as the mogu cut their way through the woods. They were making the return trip easier...$B$BThey're dragging our friends back down that path, to the ruins west of the village! Those ruins have been empty for years - our children play there.$B$BWhy would the mogu come back to them now?
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the path of fallen trees from the northwest corner of Nectarbreeze Orchard and find the mogu raiders camp.
QuestData.RewardText: This doesn't look like a quick snatch and run. They're setting up for something big.
